abstract: In a change in thinking, events will be available online as they happen. To protect the prime-time broadcast, big events, like gold-medal races, will not be archived until they have appeared on TV.
snippet: In a change in thinking, events will be available online as they happen. To protect the prime-time broadcast, big events, like gold-medal races, will not be archived until they have appeared on TV.
lead_paragraph: All 32 sports at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London will be streamed live at nbcolympics.com.

headline.main: At London Olympics, NBC Says, ‘If Cameras Are on It, We’ll Stream It’
